scripts.deploy-all: npm run deploy-lambda && npm run deploy-appsync-authenticated && npm run deploy-appsync-public && npm run deploy-backend
scripts.deploy-all-production: npm run deploy-lambda-production && npm run deploy-appsync-authenticated-production && npm run deploy-appsync-public-production && npm run deploy-backend-production
scripts.deploy-all-production-force: npm run deploy-lambda-production-force && npm run deploy-appsync-authenticated-production-force && npm run deploy-appsync-public-production-force && npm run deploy-backend-production-force
scripts.deploy-lambda: cd Lambda && cross-env SLS_DEBUG=* serverless deploy
scripts.deploy-appsync-authenticated: cd AppSync/authenticated && cross-env SLS_DEBUG=* serverless deploy
scripts.deploy-appsync-public: cd AppSync/public && cross-env SLS_DEBUG=* serverless deploy
